. It has much history starting from 1945 when it was changed from Tarrawarra to Dapto.
To get to Dapto, catch a Cityrail train from Sydney on the Illawarra South Coast line. You can also catch a plane to the Illawarra Regional Airport at Albion Park then catch a bus to Dapto.
You can walk 90% of the time around Dapto, as everything is in close range of everything else, however bus transport is also recommended as buses are reliable. There is also taxi's.

Lake Illawarra:
Catch a Bus from Dapto Mall.
Go and watch the Dapto Dogs at the showground.

Dapto Mall, Dapto Leagues Club and the Community Centre provide a variety of things to do.
There is an annual Street Fair every September on Fathers Day. Following that is the Dapto Show.
There are sometimes special shows like Monster Trucks etc during the year.
Sunday mornings there are the 'flea markets' where one can find great bargains.
There is a Big W located in Dapto Mall, along with Coles, Woolworths and many specialty shops.
Dapto Mall's foodcourt has a Subway along with other eateries, and El Comida is a delicious Mexican Restaurant located on Baan Baan Street.
Dapto Hotel can provide accommodation at reasonable rates.
